error.signature: An error occurred (AccessDeniedException) when calling the X operation

verdict.summary: IAM permissions insufficient for the requested operation.

dead_ends.why_fails: Severe security risk, violates least-privilege principle
Root should never be used for API calls, critical security issue

workarounds.action: Check which specific permission is needed using CloudTrail or IAM Access Analyzer
Add the minimum required IAM policy for the specific action and resource

leads_to.condition: Has permissions but wrong region or resource name

preceded_by.condition: Refreshed token but new role has insufficient permissions

frequently_confused_with.distinction: ExpiredToken means valid permissions but expired session; AccessDenied means active session but insufficient permissions
